Articles.Content:
Here\'s a neat little challenge to play with your C7 VTOL designs. I\'d call this one of the easier challenges out there; it doesn\'t take anything super-novel in terms of design, but its tests every aspect of a good VTOL plane and is a decent trial for navigation and piloting skill.

I\'ve done this with my C7 plane 'Townsend'. Definitely doable with only C7 parts, but feel free to use whatever plane you like.

Here\'s the challenge:
Interesting. I just need the new C7 parts.(Haven\'t had time to get the new updates for anything :\'()
